amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which allowed the Secretary of State to waive certain provisions that limit assistance to governments that fail to permit certain extradictions to the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the waiver authority in section 583 with respect to governments that have failed to permit certain extraditions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deal (GA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
